course_description: This seminar explores the Middle Eastern and South Asian peoples through the critique of Orientalism. Polemics about Islam in non-Muslim contexts are at the center of inquiry, looking at the contexts of "cross-cultural" and "inter-faith" encounters and the production of knowledge about the "Orient".
